Test Group: TEST CASE 1: FILE LOADING AND PROJECT SETUP

Title: Load modal coordinate file
Steps: Click Read Modal Coordinate File > Select valid .mcf file
Expected: File path displays in text field and Console shows success message

Title: Load modal stress file
Steps: Click Read Modal Stress File > Select valid .csv file
Expected: File path displays and stress output checkboxes become enabled

Title: Enable steady-state stress option
Steps: Check Include Steady-State Stress Field checkbox
Expected: Steady-state file button and path field become visible

Title: Load steady-state file
Steps: Click Read Full Stress Tensor File > Select valid .txt file
Expected: File path displays in text field

Title: Enable deformations option
Expected: Deformations file button and path field become visible

Title: Load deformations file
Steps: Click Read Modal Deformations File > Select valid .csv file
Expected: File path displays and deformation output checkboxes become enabled

Title: Set project directory
Steps: Click File menu > Select Project Directory > Choose folder
Expected: Navigator updates to show folder contents

Title: Navigator shows filtered files
Preconditions: Project directory set with mixed file types
Expected: Only .mcf .csv and .txt files are visible

Title: Double-click file in Navigator
Expected: File loads into appropriate field

Title: Toggle Navigator visibility
Expected: Navigator panel toggles visible/hidden

Title: Sort Navigator by name
Steps: Click Name column header in Navigator
Expected: Files sort alphabetically

Test Group: TEST CASE 2: OUTPUT SELECTION AND CONFIGURATION

Title: Select Von-Mises output
Preconditions: Modal coordinate and stress files loaded
Expected: Checkbox becomes checked

Title: Select Max Principal output
Preconditions: Modal coordinate and stress files loaded
Expected: Checkbox becomes checked

Title: Select Min Principal output
Preconditions: Modal coordinate and stress files loaded
Expected: Checkbox becomes checked

Title: Select Deformation output
Expected: Checkbox becomes checked

Title: Select Velocity output
Expected: Checkbox becomes checked

Title: Select Acceleration output
Expected: Checkbox becomes checked

Title: Select Damage Index output
Expected: Checkbox becomes checked and fatigue parameters section appears

Title: Enable Time History Mode
Preconditions: Modal coordinate and stress files loaded
Steps: Check Enable Time History Mode checkbox
Expected: Scoping section with Node ID field appears

Title: Set skip modes
Steps: Open Skip first n modes dropdown > Select value
Expected: Selected value displays

Title: Enable plasticity correction
Expected: Plasticity Correction Options group becomes visible

Title: Select Neuber method
Steps: Open Select Method dropdown > Choose Neuber
Expected: Neuber displays as selected method

Title: Select Glinka method
Steps: Open Select Method dropdown > Choose Glinka
Expected: Glinka displays as selected method

Title: Open material profile dialog
Expected: Material Profile Dialog opens

Title: Load temperature field file
Steps: Click Read Temperature Field File button > Select .csv file
Expected: File path displays in text field

Title: Adjust max iterations
Expected: Value updates to 100 and warning label appears

Title: Adjust tolerance
Expected: Value updates to 1e-8 and warning label appears

Title: Enable plasticity diagnostics
Expected: Checkbox becomes checked

Title: Select extrapolation mode
Expected: Plateau displays as selected

Test Group: TEST CASE 4: ADVANCED SETTINGS AND PERFORMANCE

Title: Open Advanced Settings
Expected: Advanced Settings dialog opens

Title: Adjust RAM allocation
Expected: Value updates to 85

Title: Select Single precision
Steps: Open Solver Precision dropdown > Select Single
Expected: Single displays as selected

Title: Select Double precision
Steps: Open Solver Precision dropdown > Select Double
Expected: Double displays as selected

Title: Enable GPU acceleration
Expected: Checkbox becomes checked

Title: Apply Advanced Settings
Expected: Dialog closes and confirmation message displays

Title: Cancel Advanced Settings
Expected: Dialog closes without applying changes

Test Group: TEST CASE 5: SOLVER EXECUTION AND MONITORING

Title: Solve button enabled
Preconditions: Modal coordinate and stress files loaded with at least one output selected
Expected: SOLVE button is enabled and clickable

Title: Execute solver
Expected: Progress bar appears and advances > Console shows processing messages > Completion message displays

Title: View console messages
Steps: Click Console tab in Main Window
Expected: Console displays log messages

Title: Enter Node ID for time history
Steps: Enter node ID in Scoping field
Expected: Node ID value displays in field

Title: Enter fatigue parameter A
Expected: Value displays in field

Title: Enter fatigue parameter m
Expected: Value displays in field

Title: Progress bar updates during solve
Steps: Observe progress bar below SOLVE button
Expected: Progress bar advances from 0% to 100%

Title: Console shows validation errors
Expected: Console displays error messages about missing files

Title: Time history plot appears
Steps: Click Plot (Time History) tab in Main Window
Expected: Plot displays with time on x-axis and metric on y-axis

Test Group: TEST CASE 6: 3D VISUALIZATION AND DISPLAY CONTROLS

Title: Switch to Display tab
Expected: Display tab becomes active showing 3D view

Title: Load visualization file
Steps: Click Load Visualization File > Select .csv file
Expected: File loads and 3D points display with color mapping

Title: Adjust point size
Steps: Change Node Point Size spinbox value to 10
Expected: Point size increases in 3D view

Title: Set legend min value
Steps: Change Legend Range Min spinbox value
Expected: Color scale adjusts to new minimum

Title: Set legend max value
Steps: Change Legend Range Max spinbox value
Expected: Color scale adjusts to new maximum

Title: Adjust deformation scale
Steps: Change Deformation Scale Factor to 2 > Press Enter
Expected: Geometry deforms by factor of 2

Title: Hover over node
Steps: Move mouse over a point in 3D view
Expected: Tooltip displays Node ID and scalar value

Title: Visualization controls visible
Expected: Group is visible with point size and legend controls

Title: Graphics control group exists
Expected: Point size and legend range controls are present

Title: Deformation scale shows when needed
Expected: Deformation Scale Factor label and field are visible

Title: Deformation scale hidden initially
Preconditions: Display tab with no deformation data
Expected: Deformation Scale Factor controls are hidden

Test Group: TEST CASE 7: CAMERA NAVIGATION AND MANIPULATION

Title: Rotate camera
Expected: Camera rotates around model

Title: Pan camera
Expected: Camera pans across scene

Title: Zoom camera
Expected: Camera zooms in or out

Title: Reset camera
Expected: Camera returns to default position and orientation

Title: Go to node
Steps: Right-click > Click Go To Node > Enter node ID > Click OK
Expected: Camera flies to specified node and marker appears

Title: Lock camera for animation
Preconditions: Node targeted with Go To Node
Steps: Right-click > Click Lock Camera for Animation
Expected: Camera locks to follow node during animation

Title: Unlock camera
Steps: Right-click > Click Lock Camera for Animation again
Expected: Camera unlocks and checkmark clears

Title: Show time point controls
Steps: Observe Initialization & Time Point Controls group
Expected: Group is visible with time spinbox

Title: Set time point
Expected: Value updates to 0.5

Title: Update time point
Expected: 3D view updates to show results at specified time

Title: Save time point CSV
Steps: Click Save Time Point as CSV button
Expected: File save dialog opens > CSV file created after save

Title: Export velocity IC
Preconditions: Time point computed with velocity data
Steps: Click Export Velocity as Initial Condition button
Expected: File save dialog opens > APDL file created after save

Test Group: TEST CASE 9: ANIMATION PLAYBACK AND EXPORT

Title: Show animation controls
Expected: Group is visible with playback controls

Title: Select Custom Time Step mode
Steps: Open Time Step Mode dropdown > Select Custom Time Step
Expected: Custom step spinbox becomes visible

Title: Select Actual Data Time Steps mode
Steps: Open Time Step Mode dropdown > Select Actual Data Time Steps
Expected: Every nth spinbox becomes visible

Title: Set custom time step
Expected: Value updates to 0.01

Title: Set Every nth value
Preconditions: Actual Data Time Steps mode selected
Expected: Value updates to 10

Title: Set animation interval
Expected: Value updates to 100

Title: Set animation start time
Expected: Value updates to 0.1

Title: Set animation end time
Expected: Value updates to 5.0

Title: Play animation
Expected: Animation begins playing > Time advances > Pause and Stop buttons become enabled

Title: Pause animation
Expected: Animation pauses at current frame

Title: Resume animation
Expected: Animation resumes from paused frame

Title: Stop animation
Expected: Animation stops and returns to start frame

Title: Save animation as video
Expected: File save dialog opens with MP4 and GIF format options

Test Group: TEST CASE 10: SELECTION BOX AND REGION TOOLS

Title: Open context menu
Expected: Context menu appears with multiple sections

Title: Add selection box
Expected: Orange box widget appears in 3D view with handles

Title: Remove selection box
Expected: Box widget disappears from view

Title: Enable Pick Box Center
Preconditions: Context menu open with box visible
Expected: Cursor changes to crosshair

Title: Position box by picking
Steps: Click on a point in 3D view
Expected: Selection box moves to clicked location

Test Group: TEST CASE 11: HOTSPOT DETECTION AND ANALYSIS

Title: Find hotspots on view
Steps: Right-click > Click Find Hotspots on current view > Enter count > Click OK
Expected: Hotspot dialog opens showing top nodes by value

Title: Find hotspots in selection
Steps: Right-click > Click Find Hotspots in Selection > Enter count > Click OK
Expected: Hotspot dialog shows top nodes within box only

Title: Click hotspot in dialog
Steps: Click a node row in hotspot table
Expected: Camera flies to node and label appears

Title: Enable time history picking
Steps: Right-click > Click Plot Time History for Selected Node
Expected: Point picking mode activates

Title: Pick node for time history
Steps: Click on a node in 3D view
Expected: Signal emits to solver tab to plot history for that node

Title: Export time point to CSV
Steps: Click Save Time Point as CSV > Choose location > Click Save
Expected: CSV file created with NodeID coordinates and scalar values

Title: Export velocity IC to APDL
Preconditions: Time point with velocity data computed
Steps: Click Export Velocity IC button > Choose location > Click Save
Expected: APDL command file created with IC statements

Title: Export animation to MP4
Preconditions: Animation frames precomputed and ffmpeg available
Steps: Click Save as Video/GIF > Select MP4 format > Choose location > Save
Expected: MP4 video file created with animation

Title: Export animation to GIF
Steps: Click Save as Video/GIF > Select GIF format > Choose location > Save
Expected: GIF animation file created

Test Group: TEST CASE 13: UI BEHAVIOR AND VALIDATION

Title: Main window title displays
Expected: Title shows MARS: Modal Analysis Response Solver - v0.96

Title: Navigator dock movable
Steps: Drag Navigator title bar to right side
Expected: Navigator docks to right side of window

Title: Tabs switch properly
Steps: Click Display tab > Click Main Window tab
Expected: Tabs switch and show correct content

Title: Checkboxes disabled initially
Expected: All output checkboxes are disabled

Title: File path fields read-only
Steps: Try to type in modal coordinate file path field
Expected: Field does not accept keyboard input

Title: Skip modes dropdown populates
Steps: Open Skip first n modes dropdown
Expected: Dropdown shows values 0 through maximum mode count

Title: Plasticity options hidden initially
Expected: Plasticity Correction Options group is not visible
